intro: Euodia nadeaudii, commonly known as the Nadeaud's euodia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rutaceae. It is native to Madagascar and is characterized by its small, fragrant white flowers and elliptical leaves. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its bark is smooth and grayish, and it produces small, round fruits that are yellow when mature. Euodia nadeaudii is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and limited distribution.
